title: NTextProps
description: Neuron text component for rendering typography with consistent design tokens. Supports semantic heading levels, text truncation, and line clamping.

size.description: Typographic size based on design token scale.

as.description: HTML element to render the text as.

truncate.description: Whether to truncate text with ellipsis on overflow.

maxLines.description: Maximum number of lines before clamping with ellipsis.

className.description: Additional CSS class names to apply.
